content.raw: I see that the `SetMaterialShaderParam` function defined [Gazebo.cc](#!/osrf/vrx/src/189614cd2e275e059320f68578adbf7859729139/wave_gazebo_plugins/src/Gazebo.cc#lines-33) in this repo, and it looks just like a copy of the one in [Visual.cc](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/2b59492f96fcf121b33f290fd5cf0b70b42f4e22/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc#lines-1128). I wonder if the original author of the plugin had problem using the version in gazebo and had to duplicate here. The code looks very similar to me though.
content.html: I see that the SetMaterialShaderParam function defined Gazebo.cc in this repo, and it looks just like a copy of the one in Visual.cc. I wonder if the original author of the plugin had problem using the version in gazebo and had to duplicate here. The code looks very similar to me though.
